details.title: Reflection scanning near-field optical microscope
details.abstract: The design of a RSNOM developed in our laboratory is described in detail. Two methods used for making the fiber tip: the heating and pulling method and the etching method, are evaluated and compared. The differences between RSNOM and SNOM in transmission mode are also analyzed. The RSNOM was also used to observe a metallic grating which showed that the resolution is near the diffraction limit.
